attributes.action: Change the law in the showing of the Blue Card for disabled people in cars from showing the name of the holder to the face of the holder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The abuse of these cards by none disabled members of the family of the holder and other users is now cause for concern. It seems in Weymouth that there are more abled than disabled using this free perk and because of this abuse the true disabled suffer immensley.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
